website_summaries.verdict: HTC's evolution of VR accessories, Vive Tracker, is a modular motion-tracking gadget that adds extra tracking in some games, but isn't worth the hassle.
pros: Versatile design converts into various accessories
Compatible with HTC Vive VR systems
Can sometimes allow for extra immersive tricks in supported games
Future accessories could mean new ideas
cons: Messy extra dongles require empty USB ports
Some accessories don't have haptic feedback
Doesn't replace your Vive controller: it's just another thing to own

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for full body tracking and I love them. They do loose contact with the base stations occasionally and you have to spend some time getting them to work in some games that support them. Be aware they are not perfect. But I absolutely love being able to see my feet move now. I'm totally happy with them. But I love my Vive anyway. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: ToeTicket

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and perfect for the application I use them for.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for full body tracking in VRChat. Work perfectly, no problems and weird errors or glitching unless they somehow lose sight of the base stations. They hold a charge for about 3.5 to 4 hours of constant use and they charge in about an hour. Have not had any problems with battery life or tracking loss within reason. So, yeah I highly recommend these if you wanna be more animated in VR.

customer_reviews.title: Frustratingly not worth it.  Still.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what you get. Hard to pair. Instructions do not match the software and no real support to help you with it. That and not many games support this. I would not recommend these until HTC improves the pairing and more games support them. One year later, and still pretty much no games support the tracker. I don't do VR chat, I'm into the adventure games, none of which support the tracker. Still disappointed, I am thinking that this just isn't catching fire with the developers.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: While there are occasionally issues with tracking, and more annoyingly issues with the tracker connecting to the USB, it's serviceable. Full body in vr is easily worth the expense. I would recommend purchasing this with a product such as "TrackBelt + 2 TrackStraps (VR Bundle for Vive Trackers)" as to have a decently made and comfortable way of putting it on your body. As for how to put these on: - For two of the trackers, put each on the top of your foot while wearing socks. - For the waist tracker, put it at either the left side or the right side of your waist, so you can lay down without losing tracking.

product_meta.title: HTC VIVE Virtual Reality System Tracker 2018
product_meta.description: Style:SingleThe Vive tracker creates a wireless and seamless connection between your attached tools and the Vive system. Attach a DSLR camera to the Vive tracker to make Mixed reality videos and expand the fun.
feature_bullets: With Vive tracker, play VR games and experiences never possible before.
With the compact, highly flexible, Easy to attach Vive tracker you'll be able to bring physical objects into your virtual world, like a pair of gloves to play musical instruments, or rock climb.
Vive Tracker - Go beyond VR controllers
Bring real-world objects into your virtual world! Add VIVE Tracker to specially designed accessories to play your favorite supported games.
